triples.name: Chatbot
triples.relevance: The paper examines how chatbots are used as language learning assistants in educational settings.

triples.name: Language education
triples.relevance: Language learning is the primary domain of application for the chatbots reviewed in this systematic review.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: The paper discusses chatbots' ability to converse using natural language, which relies on natural language processing techniques.

triples.name: Systematic review
triples.relevance: The paper conducts a systematic review methodology to identify and analyze 25 empirical studies on chatbot-supported language learning.

triples.name: Social presence theory
triples.relevance: The paper uses Garrison's social presence framework to analyze the social affordances of using chatbots in language learning.
